website_summaries.verdict: An ideal changing table for parents who want quality and safety without spending a lot of money.
pros: Offers durability and safety for an affordable price
We love that this inexpensive model features safety rails and a no-tip design that is not too difficult to assemble
cons: The diaper-changing pad that comes with this changing table is not very thick

customer_reviews.title: Clear and easy assembly, lovely look
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I am impressed. The instructions were super clear. I didn’t get confused even once and I got the table together, by myself in about 20 min. They were some of the best instructions I’ve read for furniture. I especially liked the interior bolts so the screws went in correctly the first time and stayed secure. Also, I really like how the table looks. The wood is the color I wanted and there were no scratches. The packaging was perfect as the pieces were wrapped and arrived without any piece having marks. I would definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: A Miniature Changing Table
customer_reviews.text: I cannot begin to describe how small this changing table is... My 8 year old daughter stands at it changing her dolls, and it looks like it was made for her. My wife is 5'8" and I'm 6'3" and it is a back breaker. How is this an Amazon Top Pick item!? It's a joke. I'm going to have to order a different one.
customer_reviews.author: TPJR

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy... Reliable... Great for extra storage
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this changing table. My sons room is extremely small and doesn’t have a lot of room for excess furniture. This checked multiple boxes, allowing us to change him and also store things like diapers, wipes, burp clothes, lotions, etc. it is quite sturdy. My only suggestion is to buy a changing table mattress because the cheap one that comes with it is useless. Product arrived in great condition and in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: It is a great changing table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister when she had her son almost 2 years ago. She used it for him and then again for his sister who is 6 months old now. It is a great changing table, love the color and quality--and despite what many of the other reviews claimed, there was no weird smell to it at all. Lots of space underneath for storage. Unfortunately, she had to throw it out after a hurricane hit her house a few weeks ago. I would recommend this to any new parents or to someone looking to buy a nice baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice large change table
customer_reviews.text: We've been using a co-sleeper as a change table for the past 2 years and with a new little one on the way it was time to upgrade to a real one. This table is a good height and seems very sturdy. I wish the front rail was higher since using a changing pad in it makes the pad the same height as the rail. It was fairly easy for 2 people to assemble (~15 min) but you have to be very careful since the wood is soft and scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Just wOnderful

customer_reviews.title: Too short for anyone taller than average.
customer_reviews.text: This would be perfect if it were made for anyone over 4'0" tall. I'm 5'8" and I can sit in a chair and use this. I have to hunch over to use it stabding up. It works perfectly with a mini crib but I didn't realize mini meant short. :(
customer_reviews.author: FrickandMab

customer_reviews.title: This is a great wooden baby changing table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wooden baby changing table. It is solid and sturdy and has a strap to on the table to help assist in securing the baby. Obviously don't leave your baby unattended on the changing table. This is nice to have especially for fidgety babies. To add additional stability I added wood glue to all the wood dowels and all the groves/slats. We liked this changing table so much we bought another one for our main floor. The opening for the pad, which is sold separately, is about 33.5" by about 16.5".
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: The paint and fake wood material used for this changing table are INCREDIBLY cheap looking, as well as easily damaged. Several times just while assembling it as per the directions EVERYTHING was scratching off the paint, and it just looked like crap afterwards with a bunch of missing paint parts all over it. Building it should not damage it. Very VERY disappointed. Especially because I waited a month after buying it to even open it because we were moving and it was for my babies new nursery so I couldn’t even return the thing. Don’t waste your time!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani KaraLee

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Actually really sturdy changing table. So happy I got this one. You can try to shake it and it doesn't budge like most self assembly furniture. Great height (I'm 5'3 and the actual changing level where your baby is reaches my hips so no bending over). The spaces for storage are a functional amount of space in between so you can easily store things on the shelves. Looks great and matches my other cherry red wood furniture. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful changing table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful changing table - but the pad that it comes with is flat and larger than normal changing table pads, so if you buy fitted sheets for the rounded changing table pads, they won't fit on the pad included with this table. YOu'll have to buy the pad as well. This wasn't an issue for me, I just returned the sheets and use a receiving cloth to cover the pad that came with this table. I put this together on my own and it took me about 30 minutes, super easy and instructions were clear. Packaging was very nice so nothing was scratched or damaged. My sons nursery looks beautiful with all of this new Delta furniture in it!
customer_reviews.author: kschultz3315

customer_reviews.title: Great changing table but buy a new changing pad
customer_reviews.text: The changing table is together and looks beautiful and of good quality. I would highly recommend replacing the changing pad. The one that comes with the changing table is paper thin, and the hardware that connects the snaps is directly in the middle of the baby's back. I can only imagine that would be uncomfortable or even painful during a diaper change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so Far
customer_reviews.text: This fits well with our DaVinci Kalani crib! Very cute and seems sturdy. The changing pad that comes with it is very thin. Also, you won't be able to use the straps if you get a cover because they pop out of the middle of the pad. I may end up getting a new changing pad just for a cover to work properly. Otherwise, the table is cute, fits nice and seems like it will be sturdy! Also shelves are about 11 inches tall, so the typical bins of 13" won't work with this
customer_reviews.author: Car710

customer_reviews.title: Best changing table ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this changing table some time ago and found myself in need of another table (original not broken, just replacing playpen changing table). Was delivered a little early and went together in a snap. I did put a set of raisers under it but both myself and my spouse are very tall and it's the only way to use any changing table without hurting our backs.
customer_reviews.author: Figment

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and holds up well. It was able to support my entire 180 lbs body along one of the top rails. Would recommend securing it to a wall, but only because it would be very easy for a toddler to try climbing. Rails and slats are indeed real wood. The panels I'm unsure of, but they are solid and the part supporting the baby is about 3/8" thick so no worry's about baby falling through.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Good quality wood. Is very sturdy. Instructions are easy to follow. Has a large storage area. I thought it would be shorter than I like, but the height is good... about waist level ( and I'm 5'5"). It doesn't kill my back to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Just as Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Came just as advertised and expected. I like that I was able to match this to our crib, which we purchased separately. They have multiple color options to choose from, which made it so much easier. I got little bins to hold all the diapering necessities underneath on the shelves and it looks wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control (Updated) - Replacement parts provided
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the parts don’t align correctly so I can’t even assemble it. Contacting the manufacturer for replacements parts and if I don’t hear back I will return it Update: After about 3 days of back and forth in my support ticket, and 6 days of shipping, I finally received my replacements parts. With the new parts, I was able to assemble everything correctly and the table looks good! Will update if needed after we put it through some use.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T

customer_reviews.title: Great changing table!
customer_reviews.text: The good: - Looks great, very study, easy to assemble (~30mins - 1 hour) The bad: - nothing yet Other: - Watch out for the finish colors on delta stuff, there is tons of options so make sure to match them exactly when buy multiple items (black cherry expresso and cherry expresso are not the same) - Would recommend this over the ones attached to the cribs (bigger, and I think buying the stuff separately is actually cheaper)
customer_reviews.author: Viren & Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was honestly expecting far less but my wife and I were pretty blown away as we pulled out the pieces and put this thing together. It was packaged nicely, pieces were clearly labeled, and it took us a half hour or less to assemble. It was a little wobbly at first, but after you get all the pieces together you just go back and tighten up with the supplied Allen wrench and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Gift recipient loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to a friend (assembly included in the giving) who had a c-section and can't bend down without pain. Hooray! Everyone with a friend who had a c-section should do this. Probably most of us with friends who didn't have a c-section should also.
customer_reviews.author: William B Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and made with quality materials. Didn't get a cheap feel whatsoever. I know some other members had posted that the changing table was too low and hurt their backs. I am a 6' tall male, the table came up toward the upper part of my thighs, if that helps you get an idea of how high it would be. It doesn't seem to me that I would need to hunch over while changing. Overall a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this changing table except the pad and restraint straps. The straps were just crap and installed wrong. I bought a superior pad. The table is strong, sturdy, easy to assemble, good looking with lots of storage. A changing table is a must.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect match for my crib same design
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect it comes with it's own very thin mattress and straps... the straps are not removable I didn't know it came with straps or I would have not bought the mattress with straps but it's fine I do recommend buying a separate mattress because the one it comes with is very very thin... this changing table goes great with my matching crib..cant wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple white changing table for my twins nursery and this is pretty much exactly what I was looking for. It was easy to put together and looks really great in their room. However, after only 8 months of use, the white "paint" had rubbed off/chipped in several spots. The quality is clearly mediocre at best. I'll be contacting the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: For the price, this is by far the best!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is the best bet! Great quality and looks great! Similar ones were priced much more expensive ($50-$100+ more!!) and the only big difference was they had drawers underneath rather than open shelving. I prefer the open shelving and put my own organizers on the shelf. This is a great diaper changing table! Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Boaty W.

customer_reviews.title: Not made for average size people
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Delta changing table I've purchased in the last 2 months. I recently had a baby and decided to have a changing table in the nursery and one in our TV room. I first ordered this changing table in white and really liked it. So I decided to order it in the black cherry to match our furniture (same table different color) What a mistake that was. It is at least 4 inches lower than the white one and my back hurts each time I change my baby. Waste of money I want my money back. Do NOT but this Delta piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: badger

customer_reviews.title: Very short
customer_reviews.text: This table is cute and has tons of storage, but is very short. I'm not a tall person at 5'6 but it made my back hurt to lean over this table and change, especially post partum. My husband installed two 2x4 boards as risers and it's still not as tall as I'd like or have seen other tables. Not a bad purchase, but def have to add height if you buy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice But Super Short
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice quality, looks nice and matches the Delta crib perfectly. However the changing table is SUPER SHORT. The changing table needs to be put on risers of some sort to be able to use it like a normal changing table without having to bend over to change the baby. Delta needs to raise the height of this product drastically. I am not a tall person and it needs to be taller. I can't even imagine what it would be like for a tall person.
customer_reviews.author: Scottydog

customer_reviews.title: Two left sides.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this changing table. Why the 3 stars? When it arrived - in factory packed box, it had two left sides and no right. When I called Delta customer service -they did not seem at all surprised. About a week later- while the half assembled changing table hung out- a right side arrived. However, it is not the exact same color as the rest of the table. In normal daylight, it is noticeable. It is close enough to get by and and I enjoy the functionality of the piece- so we called it good. Just a side note, my hubby is 6' and this piece is short for him- but a good height for my 5'3".
customer_reviews.author: WFHMof3

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, great price, all pieces don't align so makes difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paint peels off after a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Weve been using this product for over 6 months now. Structurally, this table is great. Im 4'10" and husband is 5'7" so the height of this worked for us. The rails prevent my wiggly 6 month old from rolling over(so far). But as many other reviewers mentioned, the paint peels off. It started peeling off after about a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer M. Reitz

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. Its lasted over a year with no issues. I love that you can use storage baskets or just the shelf. We use it for shoes, diaper storage, baskets for blankies... also I like the bars not only for safety but we were able to hang a diaper caddy off of it for the perfect changing area! It's quite roomy as well. Very sturdy and holding up very well to a rambunctious 30lb toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great changing table
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because it was listed as being slightly taller than other options and my husband and I are both tall. It holds 3 large or 6 narrow bins per shelf. We’ve been using it about 4 weeks and are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lambs

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together due to uneven parts and holes not being drilled out correctly
customer_reviews.text: Had to redrill holes and wedge a couples pieces together because of uneven cutting and the holes not being fully drilled to allow the bolts to go in. As in the width of the bolt was too large for the halfway drilled out hole
customer_reviews.author: JenniferA

customer_reviews.title: Too Short
customer_reviews.text: As my son isn't quite here yet, I haven't had the chance to use it but I am disappointed in how short it is. I am 5 foot 9 inches and have to hunch over. If I had done the smart thing and measured, I probably wouldn't have bought it, but it's here and put together so it's staying. I'm not really looking forward to changing diapers on it because of the height. Tall or semi-tall people I encourage you to check the measurements and plan accordingly. I should have. The upside is, it came in great condition and looks really nice. I'll probably change diapers on my daughter's changing table when I can, instead.
customer_reviews.author: EmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: This changing table matches perfectly with the Delta Children Canton Crib. It was super easy and quick to put together. Very sturdy and lots of room for storage. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: We bought this due to the great price despite reading some negotiations reviews stating the assembly ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this due to the great price despite reading some negotiations reviews stating the assembly was difficult due to wood arriving warped - we did not have that experience whatsoever thankfully! It arrived in great condition and only took me about 20 minutes to assemble. It has wonderful functionality and is also great looking! I do however suggest purchasing a changing pad even though one comes with it - the one supplied is paper thin and extremely flimsy! We grabbed a good thicked one and it still fits and works great!
customer_reviews.author: ABain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful changing table
customer_reviews.text: We bought this changing table right after our baby was born. The wood looks very nice and it is built nicely. It can hold a lot of diapers (multiple boxes full) and many packs of wipes and have plenty of room for more items. Definetly one of the top purchases we have made for the nursery. Only complaint is the pad is not very thick on top and doesn't come with a cover. We just put a thin baby blanket over and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect changing table with shelves
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together take your time so you don't chip the wood I love my changing table can't wait to open the daycare. The first piece to assemble will take two people the rest is so easy
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality,color,looks great and worth for price
customer_reviews.text: Good material ,good preoduct,easy to put it together, looks nice when you it is assembled and quality of product is really nice and light weight.only thing I wish if it had wheels with locks so we can move it from one corner to other if we needed.
customer_reviews.author: H.G.Suhagiya

customer_reviews.title: but my son told me it's fine since that is the side that will face the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my future grand-baby's shower. My son tried to put it together following the directions, but the pre-drilled holes did NOT line up. Luckily my son was able to re drill the holes to make it fit. Also the back rail was damaged, but my son told me it's fine since that is the side that will face the wall. I was embarrassed with the quality of this gift! My son didn't want to go through the trouble of returning it and ordering a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this changing table for about 3 months. Set up was not difficult, but I would recommend having a second person there to make things go a little smoother. The table is a bit lower than some other changing tables, so those with back issues may want to get something that his higher (or try to raise this one up). I am 5'11 and the table comes up to my belly button. The finish and quality is great and we have not had any issues scratching. pretty sturdy...would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: It peels. I've had it for 4 months. ...
customer_reviews.text: It peels. I've had it for 4 months. It's also a bit on the short side. By 5.5 month old barely fits now length wise. Also storage cubes have to be forced in at the very bottom to fit and it's a drag to be taking them out and putting back in. Also when building it, the holes for the screws didn't align. Another thing, the belt goes through the middle of the changing pad, making uncomfortable for baby's lower back ot bum. I had to put an extra changing pad on top to cover that or just completely remove the belt and change pad it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing table, easy to put together and great finish on the wood. I would definitely buy a changing pad to put on top, the one it comes with is super thin. Fits lots of storage bins on the shelves. it’s a great height for me (5’2).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Good enough. Not great quality or stability.
customer_reviews.text: Tedious but not awful assembly. One of the 'Middle E. Lower Rails x 4' cracked and split lengthwise upon tightening of 'Hardware and Tools' with 'M4 Allen Wrench X 1.' This after the instructions said not to chip the paint. Not shocking. Disappointing. Not the most sturdy, stable or well crafted.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and exactly what i expected for size and color. The changing pad that comes with it is super thin but i had planned on using a normal changing pad from walmart that i had already purchased so i wasn't upset. I would have used the thin pad but my changing pad sheets wouldn't stay on it because it is thin and would arch the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Racine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this changing table! It perfectly matches my DaVinci Kalani cherry cribs, but is MUCH cheaper than the DaVinci changing table. There is a ton of storage under the table. I use it to store diapers, wipes, lotions, burp cloths, bibs, and blankets. I have twins and have not found the storage to be lacking in size. This table is sturdy and was easy to put together. It looks very high quality. The only thing I would change is the changing pad. It's a bit too thin for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's very sturdy. My daughter is now 2 years old and we're still changing her on it. Paint is chipping around the edges but it's still pretty sturdy and in excellent condition to pass on. Great space for storage as you can see. The rail around it is very helpful when your baby starts to move. This will save mamas a lot of back pain. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Willard Y

customer_reviews.title: Very short. Will have to lean over baby.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but it is very short, even for me at 5’5”. I’m not sure how my husband will comfortably use it. May have to use it for storage and move the other changing pad I bought to the dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 kids currently in diapers, and have been using this table continuously since 2013. It's held up well (even with large toddlers). As some others note, the finish can come off with heavy use (ours has worn off where it touches our kitchen counter). We have 6 cube-shaped bins on the shelves (River Ridge brand - you can find them here on Amazon), and they fit perfectly. It's held up so well, I'm considering purchasing a second one when we move to a new house.
customer_reviews.author: TraderTif

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as advertised, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It arrived very nicely packaged, plenty of styrofoam packing. Zero parts missing. Instructions included. No damages or dents in the wood. It arrived brand new. Super easy to put together, maybe took me 30 minutes by myself. Very sturdy. Nice quality. Very fairly priced at 93.00. Also, only weighs about 30 pounds so it’s easy to maneuver. Looks great in the room!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Yankey

customer_reviews.title: Simply Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product very easy to install and sturdy! Pros: * Easy to Install. * Sturdy. * Convenient and can be multi purposed to other uses later. Cons: * 1 person assembly can be tricky, 2 person installation is a piece of cake! * The corners are sharp so you may need to buy appropriate casters/floor protectors based on the flooring you have.
customer_reviews.author: Raghavendra Vema

customer_reviews.title: The quality is too far away form the crib
customer_reviews.text: Compared with the crib, the quality is too far away form the crib, the only advantage is that there is no smell. In the installation, slightly careless rub, furniture surface would leave scars. I bought same color just want to match the crib,but in fact, they don't match in terms of color and material.
customer_reviews.author: Cody L

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: The Delta changing table was very easy to put together. Took hubby less than thirty minutes to do. Instructions very clear. Table is very pretty and sturdy. Glad I picked this one as well made and looks great in child's room. It holds more weight than states. All in all super changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how this item got so many good reviews. As soon as I took it out of the box I could tell the wood was cheap. That was confirmed two of the rails cracked being screwed in. Finally we went to add on the final side and found that we were given two of the same so it could not be completed. I contacted customer service and they insist I send it back before giving me my refund. Just what I want do deal with 9 months pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: but could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: This table is a bit too low for my liking, but I knew that before purchasing. The top level came up to my hip. I would have preferred a higher table (stomach level at least) so I wouldn't have to bend over. It seems that this is the "standard" height for changing tables? A small section of the shelf broke off when it was being installed so we just put some tape over it. Overall, it's okay , but could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbadminion

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, solid, and very asthetically appealing
customer_reviews.text: Well i'll start by saying that this item arrived in solid condition, was extremely easy to put together, and once together certainly didnt have the flimsy feel one expects from other simple construct furniture. utterly stable design. I purchased with baskets similar to those displayed and its so convenient; it has plenty of space for diapers, lotions, a few changes of clothing, extra wipes, and other things that will be needed right at your fingertips. My fiance and i are over a month into our first child and we are EXTREMELY happy we chose this item for our nursery along with its matching crib!
customer_reviews.author: Kiya Labadie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived broken in two places, missing pieces, and not very sturdy. Box also appeared previously opened. Very upsetting to purchase what you believe to be a nice baby shower gift only to learn it was a disappoinyment. Now the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: yesrelayer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, lovely piece
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, all the pieces were there, and easy to assemble. I assembled it myself (with the hubby occasionally checking in) when I was 8 months pregnant and did it in less than 30 minutes. The table is surprisingly sturdy--I was expecting it to be on the flimsy side since it's not a high-end piece of furniture. I'm overall very pleased with the changing table. It's nice and long, though I would like it better if it were taller. I'm only 5'3" and find the height to be fine for me (2 inches taller would be perfect), but I have a feeling hubby will feel hunched over when he's changing the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ludugirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality, great price, super sturdy, but wish it had a taller front to keep babies from rolling out though...
customer_reviews.author: Alex Boone

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this changing table. It looks really good in our living room and I store a lot of the baby's things on it. We have found it very handy. The pad is thin but you're just changing your baby on it so I don't think it matters. We did buy a thicker organic cotton one though because I wanted everything organic. I recommend this table and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Just keep in mind that there is not a readily accessible shelf for easy access to wipes and diapers. The table is big enough to support a standard sized change mat, but nothing more. I did not like the mat that it came with so I purchased a thicker more universal one. I also purchased a hanging caddy for diapers, wipes, and diaper cream so I could have easy access to them. Otherwise you either have to have them on the bottom shelf, reaching under the table, or on the change pad with the baby.
customer_reviews.author: JTW182

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's probably not the best changing table money can buy, but it is quite sturdy, looks great, and is definitely a good buy for the money. Matches the Delta crib we bought on Amazon as well. Would definitely buy again (and might buy a second one in the future to put in another room in the house)
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and instructions were easy to follow, nice looking aswell in person with what seems to be quality products
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stelter

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: This came extremely fast, very well packaged, and in perfect condition. We bought the stork craft tuscany 4 in 1 crib in cherry color and this changing table in black cherry matched almost 100 percent(you can hardly see a difference). I was super pleased with the beautiful color. Husband and I put it together within 20 minutes, assembly was very easy and we had zero problems. This piece is VERY sturdy and a perfect size for our nursery, not too big and not too small. I can foresee this lasting us a long time! If you are considering buying this, you should. You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Easy and solid
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about this table because there were a few reviews that say the shelves are cheap. All the shelves gave tongue and groove joints with screws, the lower tables are particle board, but they are about 1/4" which is way more than enough to hold our diaper bag, diapers, wipes, toys, extra pad covers, etc. the top shelve where your baby goes has an additional cross member and the shelf itself us at least 1/2". This changing station could easily hold 100lbs. It looks nice, it was easy to assemble and I'm very glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM C SHOCKLEY

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Changing table was easy to put together, and very sturdy.I would recommend having someone help you put it together because it can be tricky by yourself. The table comes with a pad and safety straps, which are adequate (the pad is a little thin).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this changing table
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this changing table. I have been using it now for 4 months and couldn't be any happier with my decision to buy it after searching a zillion changing tables! Its the perfect size and the storage underneath is great! Can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Shiko

customer_reviews.title: The most useful thing in the nursery
customer_reviews.text: The most useful thing in the nursery. Sturdy and provides a lot of storage. Everything is within reach. The best thing is, as soon as I put my baby on this, she knows she is getting a fresh diaper, and she will stop crying! I use this to change diaper, and put a blanket on top of the dresser to dress the baby. It's an assembly line and made things very easy. But the pad that comes with this changing table is very very thin, I add a contoured changing pad to make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lei B.

customer_reviews.title: ) This was pretty simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: Picked this out a few months ago; my husband and I are expecting our son in a few months. (Counting down!) This was pretty simple to put together, and seems like it’s really sturdy. It was important to me to have open shelving so that I could easily organize the changing station. I’ll update this if we have any issues when we have a chance to use it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little wobble; fixed with weight load
customer_reviews.text: The legs wobbled a bit (a quarter under it would have stabilized it), but the wobble went away once the table was loaded with changing table organizer, diapers, wipes, changing pad, etc. Could have better product quality, but it works fine in the end.
customer_reviews.author: RetroKryptonite

customer_reviews.title: Needs height
customer_reviews.text: It's table too low to be comfortable while using. I bought bed risers to raise the height and it's much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: We love this changing table and all the storage space that ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this changing table and all the storage space that comes with it. We use the bottom shelf for books and for storing extra diapers and diaper pail bags. It looks to be well made and goes great in the nursery! My husband has said a couple of times about it not being tall enough for him (he's about 5'9) but it doesn't seem to bother him enough to find something else or stay away from diaper changing!
customer_reviews.author: jasmine516

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: This changing table is very sturdy and was easy to assemble. We put off buying a changing table because of how expensive most of them are but finally took the plunge when this one went on sale. I'm pleasantly surprised at how nice it is for the price. The only drawback is that it is a little short for most people. I'm 5'2" and have no problem with it, but my husband is 5'10" and has to stoop pretty low...can be a little awkward. Can't complain too much since the dimensions are published. But overall, we're very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Great changing table LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this changing table to use at my home for my granddaughter. I researched many affordable tales and liked this one the best. I definitely recommend this changing table. Sturdy, look great, affordable and was easy to put together. I did purchase a better quality changing pad for it as the pad that came with it is too thin and poor quality. I put the other pad on top of it to add extra height. FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.author: Nance Curwick

customer_reviews.title: Simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! :) only con would be that it's shorter than we thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and matches our Delta crib nicely
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and matches our Delta crib nicely, however the changing table has a somewhat narrow base which limits stability somewhat. Will definitely need to be secured to the wall for peace of mind, but this is still a nice little changing table. Storage options are limited too.
customer_reviews.author: pw

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: This changing table has been fine except that the paint is chipping off terribly and I am constantly finding flecks of white paint on my son - not okay. I had seen other reviewers mention that before buying it but figured that they were probably treating it with harsh cleaning chemicals or using it roughly. We have used this changing table gently and it has not stood up to basic use. I'm disappointed and I encourage others to look elsewhere for a changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Baker

customer_reviews.title: A nice changing table for the baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's nursery for my new granddaughter and it fit in very nicely. I ordered it and it shipped right away, arriving within days. My son-in-law put this together easily and my daughter has been using this to change the baby. It is just the right height and has good storage below. It looks great with the crib we purchased, so we're all happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Gee

customer_reviews.title: Best baby changing station we found
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an accessory changing table and it wound up being the main table after a few days! It's sturdy, fairly easy to assemble, and holds a surprising amount of baby items on the shelves. The height is perfect for changing too. The only complaint is that mobiles and music boxes won't clamp on the curved rear, but work great on the perfect straight sides. HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Redd06

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color wood/High quality
customer_reviews.text: The change table arrived in no time! All the parts had a nice weight to them assembled perfectly without any issues. Hands down worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of a set for our daughter's nursery. It arrived in great condition, no scratches, and was very easy to assemble. It is very stable and at a good height. We purchased 4 wicker baskets that look great with this table and make storage easy. I do wish that it came with plugs to fill the screw holes to give it a more finished look though.
customer_reviews.author: A. WinderTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and the price is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this changing table with my daughter since she was a few days old she is now 13 months and 27 lbs she is also 34 inches long and this changing table arill works great. I dont always use it. I use everywhere around the house as a changing table but if you really want a table this one is it. Don't go out and buy a $300 table this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella M.

customer_reviews.title: Delta Changing Table is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: The changer is beautiful. It didn't take the grandfather and great-grandfather very long to put it together. Lovely finish. Well constructed. I would recommend this changer. Shelving below is a plus. Purchased this with the matching 5 in 1 convertible crip.
customer_reviews.author: Teri003

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was sooo easy to put together! Super sturdy & solid quality. I’d previously been changing my son on the floor and started having knee problems.. so wish I’d gotten this from the beginning!!!! I read that changing tables are a waste of money and believe me when I say that is so not true!!!! This has been a god send!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This looks really nice! My SO and I put it together and it took us about 30 minutes, not long at all! The instructions were pretty good, make sure not to tighten things up at first when you are first putting things together since you might want to be able to move things around before it is too tight! I love the piece furniture and it is great addition to the nursery :). It looks pretty sturdy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the good price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with changing table. There was a few issued getting this together, but with some tweaking it all fit. Thanks for having this product available! Please note that the shelf "boards" are not real wood. It is particle board and won't hold up to much weight. As a side note, I would have wished they would have the support on the shelving that the table-top has.
customer_reviews.author: Badgertrax

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy changing table
customer_reviews.text: A good quality product. Assembly took us about an hour due to flatness issues with the two plywood sheets. But with 4 hands we were able to put it together eventually. The changing table itself is very sturdy. We are glad we made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.B

customer_reviews.title: Love this! We have a small apartment and almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We have a small apartment and almost didn't get a changing table because we thought we wouldn't use it or wouldn't have room. Turns out we use it constantly BECAUSE we have a small apartment and don't want to fill up our living space with diaper changing supplies. Also, it means you always have stuff on hand where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: ERH

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We love it ! Its sturdy, just enough space, and just pretty overall
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality easy to install! Loved gifting this to brother and sister in law
customer_reviews.author: Sruhle89

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece but short
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful works well. I'm 67in and this table is a little too short for me. Shorter than previous table we had so when we purchased we didn't know they came in different heights. If you're shorter than me then great. If not then I would ship for a taller one to limit bending. My son likes to get his arm stuck in these slats too so we have to watch him closely as you would anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this changing table
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing table. It's perfect for my grandkids. I have two that are in diapers and I'm so glad to have a stable/solid changing table to work with. It's great to have the shelving to keep different sizes of diapers and all the other things we need available when changing diapers. The biggest part is that it is very solid and sturdy. Its a little short for my husband who is 6' 3". But I am going to buy another thicker changing pad to add to the one it comes with. I think that will help a little bit. Otherwise, I wish I would have just bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Marker

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this changing table. Assembly was easy, did not take long at all about 25 minutes. The quality of the wood is very good, sturdy. Looks great matches my baby crib. Plenty of shelf space beneath. Overall I feel like it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful changing table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful changing table for the price. The pad that comes with it is too thin (in my opinion). The assembly was pretty straight forward (I know there were some concerns in previous reviews). Good height. Storage underneath is deep so my other kids could not just go and get items. Also, it was big enough for bins! Great finish!! Highly Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Received this item quickly and was able to put it together in about 45 minutes! I’m 5’4” and I have to bend over a little just to properly use this item. It could be a little taller, so those much taller than me may find using this product uncomfortable. Other than that, I think it’s a great buy and goes perfect in any nursery or toddler room!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother. Table looks nice and solid enough, but as others have mentioned, poorly built. The screw in mine (as shown on the pic) went right through the wood, in the front. Customer service doesn’t answer phone or emails. I finally got a ticket number but haven’t heard back for 10 days, after having to fill a warranty claim (!). Bottom line: don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Pilchino99

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Good changing table for the price. My only problem is that the new in open box designation was incorrect. The table had scratches and a chip.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased for a $100.00 item.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, simple to put together, can be done in about 15-20 minutes. It has more of a reddish tent than expected for espresso. It's very sturdy. Screw holes are visible, but that does not affect its safety when strapping a baby to it for changing. I have it four stars because of the reddish tent, and the first item I pulled out had a minor crack " and was glued from factory instead of replaced "
customer_reviews.author: Chad Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Great table! We bought one for both levels of our house. Also have the matching dresser and crib. Very easy to assemble. Definitely recommend. Both my husband and I are tall, so we also found some risers to put under the legs and make it a little more comfortable on our backs.
customer_reviews.author: N. Truckenbrod

product_meta.title: Delta Children Eclipse Changing Table with Changing Pad, Espresso Cherry
product_meta.description: Style:Changing Table| Color:Espresso CherryThe Eclipse Changing Table combines function with style and craftsmanship. Its chic design, coupled with a gorgeous finish, makes it a must-have for your little one’s nursery. It features ample changing space with side rails to keep your baby safe. Comes with a waterproof mattress and safety strap. Two shelves provide easy to reach storage space for all things baby. Some assembly required. JPMA certified.
feature_bullets: Contains 2 shelves, safety belt, top safety rails, changing pad
Wipe clean with a damp cloth
JPMA certified; Wood construction, has a non toxic finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,491 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
